modName: Better but not overpowered Necromancer Amulet
descriptionHtml:
I felt that the default Necromancer's Amulet was way underpowered due to the heavy Health and Stamina regen penalty; however, I also felt the other mods that tried to "fix" the amulet made it overpowered, so I made my own version. The new stats are as follows:

[b]Magicka + 50[/b]
[b]Conjuration spells cost 25% less[/b]
[b]Health and Stamina regen penalty of 25%[/b] (as opposed to 75% before)
author: tobiasmar
